entry.title: Blvck Digital Planner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Digital
Price: 15.00

The All-in-one 'Blvck Digital Planner' has been carefully designed to maximize productivity and lifestyle. 

The planner helps you keep track of your yearly goals monthly progress, and daily tasks.

 

Our interactive planner builder lets you mix and match between our aesthetic wallpapers, a dozen of Blvck and Whte digital Stickers, and weekly start date!

 

Digital Planner Highlight:

- Contains 26 Blvck x Whte Digital Stickers
- 13 Aesthetic Wallpapers available
- Hyperlinks for smooth, effortless navigation

 

The All-in-one digital planner has been designed to be used in conjunction with any PDF annotation app. 

 

Follow these steps to install the Digital Planner:

1) Download a note-taking app from your tablet/computer. Goodnotes, Notability, Noteshelf and Xodo are best suited.

2) Download your digital agenda, which you will find in PDF format.

3) Import your digital diary into the previously installed note-taking application.

If you installed GoodNotes (available on iOS), you can take a look at the following tutorial to get familiar with the app:

Compatibility Check:

- Compatible across Apple, Android, and Windows devices
- Compatible with iPads, tablets (not Kindle Fire), desktop (both Windows and Apple) and Laptop computers
- Not designed for use with OneNote
- Not designed for use with mobile phones

Notes:
- This is a digital product and as such no physical product will be shipped
- This item is not designed to be printed
- Digital goods cannot be returned due to the nature of the product.

entry.title: Blvck Presets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Digital
Price: 25.00

By popular demand, Blvck Paris is finally releasing its own set of Mobile Presets.

These presets will enable you to edit your photos with a dark, minimal and 'Blvck Paris' aesthetic in just a few clicks.

Blvck Paris preset pack comes with 5 unique presets:

  1. Blvck Signature Preset: give the 'Blvck Paris' signature filter to your photos 
  2. Rainbow Preset: give a dramatic and moody filter to your photos
  3. Pitch Blvck Preset: give a bold and dark filter to your photos 
  4. Faded Preset: give a dreamy and soft mood to your photos
  5. Whte Preset:  give a bright and clean filter to your photos 

Preset filters are fast and easy solutions for anyone who wants to give a minimalistic and unique touch to their photos. You can add these presets as a filter to edit your Instagram feed.

    These presets are for Mobile Lightroom app (iOS and Android) and available for desktop version of Lightroom. 

    These presets have been tested extensively on many different style of photos and will most of the time look great after just once click. However in some cases, depending on the photos and quality, some photos may need further editing.  

    What is included:

    - 5x Mobile Presets for Lightroom (.DNG files)
    - 5x Desktop Presets (.xmp files)
    - 5x LUTs for video editing (.CUBE files)

    Instant Download:

    Once your payment has been authorised, you will immediately receive a download email shortly after.

     Why getting it: 

    - Take your photos to the next level with a professional and fresh filter touch

    - Super easy to use with the free Lightroom app  

    - Very fast. Just upload the photo on the Lightroom app, choose from our 5 presets and your photo is ready to be posted on Instagram

    How to use:

    Digital goods cannot be returned due to the nature of the product.

entry.title: Blvck iOS Icons Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Digital
Price: 10.00 - 25.00 (4 variants)

The customisation works on iOS17.
Please note that the pack is not a theme, and that you have to manually add each icon to your home screen. Once the icons are installed, notifications badges on the shortcut apps won't appear.

By popular demand, Blvck Paris is releasing 3 different icon sets made for iOS.

You can also use them for Android - check our guide on how to set it up here.

For iOS17, please check our blog post here to install.

What Is Included in each pack: 

Pack 1: Blvck Monochrome Signature Set ($15)

- 796 custom icons 
- 2 versions included: 394 Blvck & 394 Whte icons 
- 10 complimentary Mobile Wallpapers
- 10 complimentary Widget Wallpapers

 

Pack 2: Blvck Rainbow Set ($10)

- 394 custom icons 
- 10 complimentary Mobile Wallpapers
- 10 complimentary Widget Wallpapers

 

Pack 3: Blvckmoji Set ($10)

- 42 custom icons 
- 10 complimentary Mobile Wallpapers
- 10 complimentary Widget Wallpapers


Pack 4: Bundle Pack - 3 Packs in one ($25)

- 788 Blvck Monochrome + 394 Blvck Rainbow + 42 Blvckmoji Sets  
- 10 complimentary Mobile Wallpapers
- 10 complimentary Widget Wallpapers
-
Here is a video on how to customize your iOS device:   

   

Instructions to customise your home screen:
- Your files will be ready to download as soon as the payment is processed via email 
- Please make sure you have the app 'FILES' installed on your phone to be able to easily access the icons. Alternatively, you can also download them from your laptop and send them via Airdrop to your phone
- We have also prepared a step by step YouTube tutorial to help you set it up:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r7F2L2aL5xA&feature=emb_logo
- We have also prepared an updated blog post here
Digital goods cannot be returned due to the nature of the product.
